thread.title: First look at Adele’s new music video
thread.title_full: First look at Adele’s new music video

title: First look at Adele’s new music video
text:
First look at Adele’s new music video 12:30 PM Carlos Greer IT’S been four years since Adele released her record-breaking album 21, but if her new music video is anything to go by, she’s back with a vengeance. Buffy star’s ‘suicide attempt’ caught on CCTV 12:29 PM Corey Sinclair HE made a name for himself starring as Buffy’s sidekick. Now he’s angry that a media outlet published a video of him ‘attempting suicide’. Sasha’s message for Blake Garvey 12:26 PM Tiffany Dunk National TV Editor THE Bachelorette couple shared their future plans and Sasha shouted out a message for the man who broke Sam’s heart during today’s live Q & A chat. See what they revealed. Has Robbie Williams still got it? 12:04 PM Cameron Adams National music writer REVIEW: He’s the most entertaining pop star of his generation. And last night’s gig was classic Robbie. Even Hugh Jackman was impressed. Where have we seen that dress before? 11:20 AM Rebecca Sullivan WE’VE heard rumours about The Bachelorette being plagued with budget cuts. That was clear during the finale, when Sam’s dress looked a bit too familiar. New Thor movie set for Gold Coast 10:53 AM Rikkii-Lee Arnold, Andrew Potts UPDATE: PREMIER Annastacia Palaszczuk is expected to today confirm that the God of Thunder is coming to the Gold Coast in 2016. Ed Sheeran: ‘I’m better when I’m hungover’ 10:52 AM Staff writers WHAT’S Ed Sheeran’s secret to performing well on stage? Getting really drunk the night before. ‘I called Sam, she was hysterical’ 10:17 AM Emily Moulton and Alison Stephenson CHANNEL Ten has called in its lawyers, and Sam Frost herself has joined a chorus of anger in the finale’s aftermath. Adele reveals new album details, labelling it a ‘make-up record’ October 23, 2015 12:03pm ‘I’m making up with myself’ ... Superstar Adele has announced that her new album will be a ‘make-up record’ following on from the blockbuster ‘break-up record’ that was 21. Picture: AFP Email a friend 
A SIX-second snippet of Adele’s first music video in four years ago has appeared online. 
The video for the album’s first single Hello is due to be released tonight, but a snippet of the Xavier Dolan-produced clip appeared on social media at around midday. ADELE - HELLO #1 pic.twitter.com/bZQF93zZ64 — Nachopalooza (@ignaciomartin3z) October 23, 2015 
Adele has kept details about the follow-up to her record-breaking 2011 album 21 relatively quiet, but she recently confirmed its title will be 25 in a Twitter post to fans. 
The singing sensation, who’s been keeping fans waiting for a follow-up to her 2011 smash wrote, “I’m sorry it took so long, but you know, life happened.” Bounty ... Adele took home a mammoth six Grammys in 2012 for 21. One suspects something similar might happen with her upcoming album, 25. Photo: Getty Images Source: Getty Images 
Adele will premiere the music video directed by Canadian auteur Xavier Dolan for the album’s first single Hello today. 
A music insider confirmed to the New York Post that the album will have 11 tracks and “be released on Nov. 20. People will likely be able to preorder as early as this weekend.” 
Adele will premiere the music video for the album’s first single today. The song is called Hello and the music video will be directed by Canadian auteur Xavier Dolan. The Oscar-winning singer is booked to appear on Saturday Night Live and the Tonight Show in the US. 
“Other than that, she will be doing very little press,” the source told the New York Post . The voice ... The world waits with bated breath for the release of the British singer’s new album, said to be available on November 20. Picture: NBC/Universal Source: AP 
Adele’s team has kept mum on further details, but she described the new album by posting: “My last record was a breakup record and if I had to label this one I would call it a make-up record. I’m making up with myself. Making up for lost time. Making up for everything I ever did and never did. But I haven’t got time to hold on to the crumbs of my past like I used to. What’s done is done.” 
Hello...
